articles.title: Women attending first NHS mammogram hits 10-year high as thousands more cancers found
articles.snippet: Hundreds of thousands more women attended NHS breast screening last year and thousands more cancers were diagnosed early in England. New figures today show that in 2024/25, 1.94 million women aged 50 to 70 attended scree...

articles.title: NHS facing ‘second surge’ in vomiting virus as cases reach highest level this winter
articles.snippet: The NHS could be facing a “second surge” in norovirus as the vomiting bug reaches its highest level so far this winter. Figures published today show the average number of patients in hospital with norovirus each day this...

articles.title: “NHS talking therapies completely changed my life”: NHS launches major campaign to support millions more people with anxiety
articles.snippet: Millions of adults facing debilitating anxiety conditions are missing out on treatment that could help them recover and get back on with their lives the NHS has said, as it launches a major new mental health campaign. Ne...

articles.title: Thousands recruited for “new era” severe mental illness study
articles.snippet: Thousands of people living with schizophrenia and severe depression are being recruited by the NHS for a major new study which could unlock a “new era” of personalised treatment for severe mental illness. As part of the ...

articles.title: NHS waiting list lowest in almost 3 years as NHS battled busiest winter on record
articles.snippet: The NHS delivered more elective activity in 2025 than any other year in its history, helping cut the waiting list to its lowest level since February 2023. Staff delivered a historic high of 18.4 million treatments and op...
